languages.text: "Мало нам двоедушной контрабандистки и инквизиторского соглядатая по отдельности — теперь они еще и спеться пытаются..." {n}Едва слышно бормочет Абеляр себе под нос.{/n}
"As if a duplicitous smuggler and a snoop from the Inquisition weren't trying enough on their own — now they're attempting to find a rapport..." {n}Abelard mutters.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мало нам двоедушной контрабандистки и инквизиторского соглядатая по отдельности — теперь они еще и спеться пытаются..." {n}Едва слышно бормочет Абеляр себе под нос.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "As if having a duplicitous smuggler and a snoop from the Inquisition individually wasn't trying enough — now they're trying to find a rapport..." {n}Abelard mutters barely audibly.{/n}
"As if having a duplicitous smuggler and a snoop from the Inquisition individually wasn't trying enough — now they're trying to find a rapport..." {n}Abelard mutters barely audibly.{/n}
"As if a duplicitous smuggler and a snoop from the Inquisition weren't trying enough on their own — now they're attempting to find a rapport..." {n}Abelard mutters.{/n}
"As if a duplicitous smuggler and a snoop from the Inquisition weren't trying enough on their own — now they're attempting to find a rapport..." {n}Abelard mutters.{/n}
"As if a duplicitous smuggler and a snoop from the Inquisition weren't trying enough on their own — now they're attempting to find a rapport..." {n}Abelard mutters.{/n}

languages.text: 「嘘つきの密輸業者と異端審問庁の密偵が別々に行動するだけでも大変なのに、互いに協力しようとするとは…」{n}アベラルドがぶつぶつと呟く。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As if a duplicitous smuggler and a snoop from the Inquisition weren't trying enough on their own — now they're attempting to find a rapport..." {n}Abelard mutters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「嘘つきの密輸業者と異端審問庁の密偵が別々に行動するだけでも大変なのに、互いに協力しようとするとは…」{n}アベラルドがぶつぶつと呟く。{/n}

languages.text: “就好像两面三刀的走私犯和审判庭的探子觉得自己还不够努力似的……他们现在甚至在想办法融洽相处……”{n}阿贝拉德喃喃自语道。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As if a duplicitous smuggler and a snoop from the Inquisition weren't trying enough on their own — now they're attempting to find a rapport..." {n}Abelard mutters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “就好像两面三刀的走私犯和审判庭的探子觉得自己还不够努力似的……他们现在甚至在想办法融洽相处……”{n}阿贝拉德喃喃自语道。{/n}

languages.text: «Por si no fuera poco con una contrabandista artera y un soplón de la Inquisición, ahora tienen que dar con la forma de entenderse...». {n}Abelard murmura.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As if a duplicitous smuggler and a snoop from the Inquisition weren't trying enough on their own — now they're attempting to find a rapport..." {n}Abelard mutters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Por si no fuera poco con una contrabandista artera y un soplón de la Inquisición, ahora tienen que dar con la forma de entenderse...». {n}Abelard murmura.{/n}

languages.text: « Comme si la présence d'une contrebandière fourbe et d'un mouchard de l'Inquisition ne suffisait pas... les voilà qui s'entendent maintenant comme larrons en foire, » {n}marmonne Abélard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As if a duplicitous smuggler and a snoop from the Inquisition weren't trying enough on their own — now they're attempting to find a rapport..." {n}Abelard mutters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comme si la présence d'une contrebandière fourbe et d'un mouchard de l'Inquisition ne suffisait pas... les voilà qui s'entendent maintenant comme larrons en foire, » {n}marmonne Abélard.{/n}

languages.text: "Als wären eine heuchlerische Schmugglerin und ein Spitzel der Inquisition nicht alleine schon Aufgabe genug ... jetzt ziehen sie auch noch am selben Strang ..." {n}Abelard stöhnt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As if a duplicitous smuggler and a snoop from the Inquisition weren't trying enough on their own — now they're attempting to find a rapport..." {n}Abelard mutters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Als wären eine heuchlerische Schmugglerin und ein Spitzel der Inquisition nicht alleine schon Aufgabe genug ... jetzt ziehen sie auch noch am selben Strang ..." {n}Abelard stöhnt.{/n}

languages.text: "Düzenbaz bir kaçakçıyla burnunu her işe sokan bir Engizisyoncu tek başlarına yetmiyormuş gibi bir de el birliğine başladılar." {n}Abelard kendi kendine söyleniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As if a duplicitous smuggler and a snoop from the Inquisition weren't trying enough on their own — now they're attempting to find a rapport..." {n}Abelard mutters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hilekâr bir kaçakçı ve burnunu her şeye sokan bir Engizisyon görevlisi ile kendi başlarına uğraşmak yeterince zor değilmiş gibi, şimdi de uyum içinde hareket etmeye başlıyorlar." {n}Abelard kendi kendine söyleniyor.{/n}
